verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines: O, the children of the Lord have a right to shout and sing, For the way is growing bright, and our souls are on the wing; We are going by and by to the palace of a King! Glory to God, hallelujah!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We are lost amid the rapture of redeeming love Glory to God, hallelujah! We are rising on its pinions to the hills above: Glory to God, hallelujah!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We are going to a palace that is built of gold; Glory to God, hallelujah! Where the King in all His splendor we shall soon behold Glory to God, hallelujah!

verse.name: v4
